name: Space Escape (MichaelsGameLab)
description:
Made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam Theme: Roll of the Dice.

In this puzzle platformer you play as an alien that is being kept as a prisoner on a space ship with the goal of escaping. You pick-up different abilities as you go, but you can only use one ability at a time. After an ability is used up, the selected ability will re-roll to a random ability.

Controls:

Movement: WASD or Arrows
Jump: Spacebar (or E when super jump ability is active)
Use Ability: E
Open Options Menu: P
Unlock/Open Doors: Enter
Dialog: Enter
